presentationTable.name: Base Facts
presentationTable.description: This folder contains all the base facts like Revenue, Quantity, Target, Headcount and so on. All the metrics in this folder have the aggregation type as Sum unless explicitly specified.

presentationColumns.name: 1- Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.1- Revenue
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 3- Discount Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.3- Discount Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Discount Amount data. Sources from Discount Value physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 4- Paid Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.4- Paid Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Paid Amount data. Sources from Revenue column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Paid time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 7- Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.7- Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Booked Amount data. Sources from Dollars column in FactsRev table joining to time using Booked time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 8- Booked Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.8- Booked Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Booked Amount data. Sources from Dollars column in FactsRev table joining to time using Booked time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 9- Full Time Empl  (Beg Period)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F4 Headcount Base Measures.9- Full Time Empl  (Beg Period)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Headcount (First of Time) data. Sources from Headcount column in 'Sample Headcount Fact' view. Heacount grain is Month, Office.

- Returns First on Time over Time dimension and Sum of data over any other dimension.

presentationColumns.name: 9- Full Time Empl  (End Period)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F4 Headcount Base Measures.9- Full Time Empl  (End Period)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Headcount (Last of Time) data. Sources from Headcount column in 'Sample Headcount Fact' view. Heacount grain is Month, Office.

- Returns Last on Time over Time dimension and Sum of data over any other dimension.

presentationColumns.name: 10- Variable Costs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.10- Variable Costs

presentationColumns.name: 11- Fixed Costs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.11- Fixed Costs

presentationColumns.name: 5- Target Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F2 Fragmented Measures Targets.5- Target Revenue
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Target Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Targets Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  Target Revenue is available at the Month level grain.

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 6- Target Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F2 Fragmented Measures Targets.6- Target Quantity
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Target Quantity data. Sources from Units physical column in 'Sample Targets Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  Target Quantity is available at the Month level grain.

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension
